DESCRIPTION: Playing stamped cards grants #yMoxie. When you reach #b5 #yMoxie, gain [E] .
May be spent at any point in combat to draw cards.
Trigger the Dequip effect of your current weapon or shield, then replace it with a new one.
The default weapon. NL #yHit: Deal #b!P! damage. NL Dequip: Deal #b!D! damage to a random enemy.
The default shield. NL #yGuard: Gain #b!P! block. NL Dequip: Gain #b!D! #yBlock.
Weapon. NL #yHit: Deal #b!P! damage. NL Dequip: Apply #b!D! #yVulnerable to ALL enemies.
Weapon. NL #yHit: Deal #b!P! damage. NL Dequip: Gain #b!D! #yVigor.
Weapon. NL #yHit: Deal #b!P! damage. NL Dequip: Gain #b!D! #yStrength.
Weapon. NL #yHit: Deal #b!P! damage and increase dequip damage by #b!S!. NL Dequip: Deal #b!D! damage to ALL enemies.
Weapon. NL #yHit: Deal #b!P! damage and gain #b!S! #yAegis. NL Dequip: ALL enemies lose #b!D! #yStrength.
Weapon. NL First #b!S! #yHits deal #b!P! damage. NL Further #yHits deal #b2 damage. NL Dequip: Nothing.
Shield. NL #yGuard: Gain #b!P! #yBlock. NL Dequip: Gain #b!D! #yAegis.
Shield. NL #yGuard: Gain #b!P! #yBlock. Gain #b!S! #yBlock next turn. NL Dequip: Gain #b!D! #yTix.
Shield. NL #yGuard: Gain #b!P! #yBlock. Gain #b!S! #yVigor. NL Dequip: Gain #b!D! #yStrength.
If you end your turn while bearing #b3 or more Weight, lose #b6 HP and all Weight.
